meanings.definition: 放射線立体視法、X線立体視法
meanings.english_definition: A stereoscopic technique using X-rays to produce a three-dimensional image of the internal structures of an object.

examples.sentence: Radiostereoscopy is used in medical imaging to visualize bone structures in three dimensions.
examples.translation: 放射線立体視法は、医療画像処理において骨構造を3次元で可視化するために使用されます。
